body:
Locally, I get completely different test results:

```
 0:00.96 LOG: Thread-9 ERROR Unexpected exception Error: Previous preference value is of type "32", but was given "0" (undefined) at resource://shield-recipe-client/lib/PreferenceExperiments.jsm:217
start@resource://shield-recipe-client/lib/PreferenceExperiments.jsm:217:15
_do_main@/Users/amikulski/ff-src/mozilla-central/testing/xpcshell/head.js:211:5
_execute_test@/Users/amikulski/ff-src/mozilla-central/testing/xpcshell/head.js:546:5
@-e:1:1
```

I will make the corrections you've mentioned in the above post, however I think I'm going to have to wipe everything and see if a clean 'install' fixes my issues. I haven't had any test results that align with what you/mythmon get when running the tests locally.

Are there any docs on working with the `recipe-client-addon`? I've never actually seen anything that details how to get tests running etc.
